Package snowpackage

Class SnowFlakePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • snowpackage.SnowFlakePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class SnowFlakePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This panel contains the generated snowflake that generates its self live.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.awt.Shape flipArea​(java.awt.geom.Area origArea)
      Flips an Area using AffineTransform, moving it to the border, scaling it by -1 and retranslating it in the center.
      void generatePNG​(java.lang.String filename, int width)
      Generates a PNG image, using a Graphics2D object to paint the snowflake.
      void generateSVG​(java.lang.String filename)
      Generates an SVG file based on the Graphics2D object in the paintComponent method.
      void paintComponent​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Draws the generated snowflake on the panel.

      Rotates the Shape origPoints by the angle, using AffineTransform.
      java.awt.Shape translateToCenter​(java.awt.Shape origShape)
      Translates to the center of the panel a Shape, moving it to the border and retranslating it in the panel's center.
      java.awt.Shape translateToSide​(java.awt.Shape origPoints)
      Translates to the side of the panel a Shape, moving it to the border and retranslating it in the panel's side.
